Where other call center platforms stop, TeleDirect offers next-level hosted call center software and more. To ensure reliability and redundancy, our cloud contact center has geographically dispersed, fault-tolerant web architectures that are carefully monitored and managed to deliver maximum uptime and connectivity.

Outsource your call center with confidence – TeleDirect has all the bases covered for the best possible customer service, thanks to our call center software solutions.

The Advantages of Hosted Call Center Software and Cloud Call Center Technology

Our virtual cloud call center software does more than just manage the process of inbound and outbound calls. It helps you connect with customers across a wide variety of communications channels. These include inbound and outbound voice, voicemail, email, live chat, video, social media, voice portals, and more. With this powerful ability to communicate with customers anytime, anywhere, your cloud call center can:

  • More effectively manage customer relationships from beginning to end
  • Connect with more lead by leveraging proper dialing strategies and technology
  • Improve efficiency with optimized agent schedules and detailed analytical reports
  • Easily survey customers to improve business intelligence
  • Remain TCPA compliant

You can even integrate your call center software data with leading customer management relationship systems (CRMs) to improve customer satisfaction. With our virtual call center software at your disposal, it’s easier than ever to handle customer communication, optimize workflow, and ensure superior ROI for your entire operation!
